description_html:
Duravit’s DuraSquare collection showcases the brand’s signature style of clean, modern lines and minimal shapes. The collection is a fresh take on furniture and ceramics, offering a full-service series of both contemporary design and impeccable quality.

DuraSquare’s furniture frame base is height-adjustable and available in either silver (chrome) or an on-trend matte black. The furniture frame features a glass storage shelf that is available in six different colors including Jade, Stone Blue and Flannel Grey, which brings a unique, personalized splash of color to the bathroom. Along with the glass shelf, the furniture frame includes a sleek towel rack for added convenience.

Refined and classic, DuraSquare pursues a new take on a timeless rectangular shape, and includes a variety of customizable features.
